name: Minecraft Dungeons: Jungle Awakens
description:
Minecraft Dungeons: Jungle Awakens is an action-RPG game developed by Double Eleven and Mojang. It was originally released in 2020. It was published by Xbox Game Studios. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Minecraft Dungeons: Jungle Awakens on PC, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch. You can purchase the game on Xbox Store.
